reviews.title: Beautiful app.
reviews.comment: What a fantastic app this is.  Very well designed.  Lovely music and lots to choose from. Will probably upgrade when I have completed all the free programmes.
reviews.author: Sarah Ferrigan

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: This is the best yoga app i\'ve ever found. They have execelent yoga sessions that makes me fit.
reviews.author: jona rica serva

reviews.title: Great but I have ideas for improvements
reviews.comment: I upgraded to the pro version and am enjoying the programs that are only available in pro. So far, I feel that the pro is worth it but I\'m curious to see if I still feel that way in 6 months or a year. I have some suggestions for the programs. I wish that each set lasted closer to 30 minutes instead of 10. Also, I would like for each program session to include warm-up poses and cool-down or relaxation poses. The sets seem too abrupt in their start and finish. With these changes, I would go up to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Emily Flury

reviews.title: The best yoga app
reviews.comment: I really like this app , I just wish there was more than one free programme :|
reviews.author: Manal Al-oufi

reviews.title: Responded to feedback
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app and the developers respond to feedback by improving it further.
reviews.author: Ben Bowler

reviews.title: A perfect app!
reviews.comment: Beautiful design, useful and easy to access functions, motivating, high quality videos and plenty of opportunities for sharing your experiences. I love it!
reviews.author: Yuliya Makarova

reviews.title: Great app on some devices
reviews.comment: I like this app and have had it for long time. It offers some good routines, although not all flow naturally. Sometimes you switch between laying down and then you need to be stood up without flowing from one to the next with a joining posture. It works great on my htc desire however the screen is small. I installed it on my samsung galaxy tab 2 10\" however it will not play any routines and just crashes, which is a shame.  Very useful app with good free content. Adverts are not too intrusive and cancel with one click.
reviews.author: Stephen Towson

reviews.comment: Great app but neither the app nor its plugins cant be saved to SD card

reviews.comment: This is a great app for beginners! Option to upgrade at reasonable cost.

reviews.comment: I am really happy with this app and will definitely go pro!  Its just what I needed to graduate to my next level without replacing all my dvds AND I can travel with it.  Nice
